Tables

Add sui-table class to style correctly your table element.

Title A Title B Title C
Row Title Row content...
Row Title Row content...
Row Title Row content... 
<table class="sui-table">

	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Title A</th>
			<th>Title B</th>
			<th>Title C</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>

	<tbody>

		<tr>
			<td class="sui-table-item-title">Row Title</td>
			<td>Row content...</td>
			<td><input type="text" class="sui-form-control" /></td>
		</tr>

	</tbody>

	<tfoot>
		<tr colspan="3">
			<button class="sui-button sui-button-blue">
				Save Changes
			</button>
		</tr>
	</tbody>

</table>
